name: Cavata Kids Pink EST. 2008 Hoodie

Made with premium soft heavyweight fabric that will hold up with even the roughest of kids, the Cavata Kids EST. 2008 Hoodie is available in bright pink and features an illustrated blue starphone logo. - 60% cotton - 40% polyester fleece - Side pockets - 7.5 oz. name: Team CAVATA Starphones Jacket (HEATHER GREY)
description: Team CAVATA Starphones Jacket-$100 Perfectly broken-in like your old-school varsity jacket, this throw-back style features raglan sleeves with contrast jersey piping and six snaps for closure. Accented with a rib neckband and sleeves, plus two front welt pockets. Made of unbelievably soft Eco-Cashmere Jersey, this lightweight jacket also featured an embroidered navy Starphones logo outlined in white on the front left chest. Every purchase helps support local music and art-education programs
